vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.8.36;
son of: Ahaz (H0271H);
father of: Alemeth (H5964I), Azmaveth (H5820H) and Zimri (H2174H); also called Jarah at 1Ch.9.42;
Also named: ya.rah (יַעְרָה "Jarah" H3294)
§ Jehoadah = "Jehovah has adorned"
a descendant of Saul through Jonathan
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Ahaz; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶何阿達 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "耶何華已裝飾"
掃羅由約拿單一脈所傳下的後代
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
耶何阿达 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "耶何华已装饰"
扫罗由约拿单一脉所传下的后代
